hero.title: Dinnartec
hero.description: AI-based solutions that save you time and money.

about.label: 01 — About
about.title: What is Dinnartec?
about.description: Dinnartec is a technology company founded by engineers with one goal: build solutions that transform industries.
about.content: We combine strategy with execution. We don't just plan, we build. And we do it step by step.

pillarItems.name: Research
pillarItems.description: We explore new ways to solve problems

pillarItems.name: Innovation
pillarItems.description: We create original solutions to real problems

pillarItems.name: Adaptation
pillarItems.description: We evolve with the market and its needs

pillarItems.name: Revolution
pillarItems.description: We transform industries, not just participate in them

pillarItems.name: Technology
pillarItems.description: The engine behind everything we do

solutions.label: 02 — Services
solutions.subtitle: AI applied to your business.
solutions.description: We detect what's slowing you down and fix it. More revenue, lower costs, greater efficiency.
solutions.tagline: From problem to solution. No detours.

diagnosis.title: Diagnosis
diagnosis.description: We analyze your operation to identify high-impact opportunities

sprint.title: Implementation
sprint.description: We execute concrete solutions in 2-4 weeks

support.title: Support
support.description: We maintain, adjust, and improve implemented solutions

diagnosis.name: Bronze
diagnosis.description: We understand your business, identify opportunities, and create an action plan.

sprint.name: Silver
sprint.description: We execute concrete solutions in a few weeks.

s.name: S
s.description: Ideal for a single automation or integration

retainer.name: Gold
retainer.description: We maintain, improve, and expand implemented solutions.

growth.name: Growth
growth.includes: Bronze + Silver M + 3 months Gold S

scale.name: Scale
scale.includes: Bronze + Silver L + 3 months Gold M

factory.label: 04 — Products
factory.subtitle: Where we create our own products.
factory.description: We build what the world needs.
factory.content: Factory takes the patterns we detect while solving problems and turns them into independent products that scale globally.

labs.label: 05 — Research
labs.subtitle: Where we research and experiment.
labs.description: We explore the future of technology.
labs.content: Labs is where we experiment with emerging technologies, develop internal capabilities, and prepare the innovations that will define our next products and services.

experimental.title: Experimental Projects
experimental.description: Prototypes and proof of concepts exploring new technological possibilities

emerging.title: Emerging Technologies
emerging.description: Research in advanced AI, blockchain, quantum computing, and more

capabilities.title: Internal Capabilities
capabilities.description: Development of tools and methodologies that enhance our work

contact.label: 06 — Contact
contact.title: Let's build something together
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Want to optimize your business? Let's talk.

footer.tagline: Innovating the future, improving the present.
